area_name: Level IB - SE Face of Pinnacle Mountain

content.description: Fun face climbing on good holds.Likely a popular solo, or, easy beginner route.Nice shady location at the base.Take care if there's any loose rock especially near the top.  Be aware that hikers on the trail could be below.
content.protection: If a rope is deployed, likey its from the top.  Unknown pro options.  Take a rack and see!
content.location: Located 10 feet left of "Loose Tooth".  The loose tooth is a horizontal rock spike  located up high on the cliff.Left side of the IB area.

pathTokens: Level IB - SE Face of Pinnacle Mountain

content.description:
Shady location at the base of this crag as it rises out of the trees. 

  Around a half dozen routes ranging from mostly easy fifth class to a steep, fingery 5.10-ish crack. 

  The crag ranges in height from around 40 to 55 feet.
